comment.author: 26746586@N00
comment._content: After being the Boxing Champion of the World, Jimmy Clabby is said to have squandered over $500,000 in earnings, and was found dead of starvation in Calumet City during the Great Depression More on Jimmy Clabby www.boxrec.com/media/index.php?title=Human:53088

comment.author: 32946299@N07
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called FLICKR PARA LA HISTORIA , and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 56656338@N06
comment._content: This is such a great sports history photo, there is so much we can learn just from this one picture. One of the most noticeable things is how the athlete influences the wardrobe. By this I mean that we can appreciate the growth of the skill and strength of the athletes over time, and see that the size of the athlete and the accessories like the gloves have changed. Could you imagine if the modern brutes had these small padded gloves to hit with? We'd be talking career ending blows in a number of bouts.

comment.author: 32982039@N07
comment._content: Those are bag gloves, not boxing gloves for competition.
